bug.title: When clicking the done button after selecting episodes, the checkboxes are not cleared
Play Store Report: Unhandled NullPointerException
bug.body: ``` java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to start activity ComponentInfo{com.rastating.droidbeard/com.rastating.droidbeard.MainActivity}: java.lang.NullPointerException at android.app.ActivityThread.performLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:2216) at android.app.ActivityThread.handleLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:2265) at android.app.ActivityThread.access$800(ActivityThread.java:145) at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:1206) at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:102) at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:136) at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:5140) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invokeNative(Native Method) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:515) at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(ZygoteInit.java:795) at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:611) at dalvik.system.NativeStart.main(Native Method) Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rastating.droidbeard.fragments.ShowFragment.onRefreshButtonPressed(ShowFragment.java:124) at com.rastating.droidbeard.fragments.ShowFragment.onCreateView(ShowFragment.java:88) at android.app.Fragment.performCreateView(Fragment.java:1700) at android.app.FragmentManagerImpl.moveToState(FragmentManager.java:890) at android.app.FragmentManagerImpl.moveToState(FragmentManager.java:1062) at android.app.FragmentManagerImpl.moveToState(FragmentManager.java:1044) at android.app.FragmentManagerImpl.dispatchActivityCreated(FragmentManager.java:1853) at android.app.Activity.performCreate(Activity.java:5234) at android.app.Instrumentation.callActivityOnCreate(Instrumentation.java:1087) at android.app.ActivityThread.performLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:2170) ... 11 more ```

bug.title: Restarting from DroidBeard fails after changing HTTPs settings in Sick Beard
bug.body: If disabling HTTPS in Sick Beard and then restarting it using DroidBeard via the action bar it will be stuck in an infinite loop throwing javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException exceptions.

bug.title: Timeouts and errors cause shows screen to no longer load
Tapping and holding on a season name displays the episode context menu
bug.body: When the context menu opens it does so in the context of the last selected episode or if one hasn't been selected shows null values.

bug.title: Refactor AsyncTask calls to allow parallel execution
bug.body: Longer running tasks that run in the background such as manual searching of episodes results in normal operations being queued up due to thread pool changes in certain versions of Android. The below snippet should resolve the issue: ``` java @TargetApi(Build.VERSION_CODES.HONEYCOMB) // API 11 void startMyTask(AsyncTask asyncTask) { if(Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.HONEYCOMB) asyncTask.executeOnExecutor(AsyncTask.THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR, params); else asyncTask.execute(params); } ``` See http://stackoverflow.com/a/4072832/1243584 for an explanation of the thread pool changes.

bug.title: App crashes when opening a fragment whilst another is loading
bug.body: Only tested with no network connectivity, will most likely happen if there is connectivity too though.
